front.title: Talking to Stuff In The Network: Middlebox Communication Models

abstract.t: It is increasingly common for applications to want to influence thebehavior of equipment in the network, in violation of varioustenets underpinning the the design of IP. A number of differentmechanisms and architectures have been proposed, and this verydrafty draft is a hoped to be a start at discussing some of theissues related to protocols used for middlebox communication.
